alert.note: Alert for Montour; Northumberland; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 07 at 4:34PM EDT until August 07 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following counties, Montour, Northumberland, Snyder and Union. * WHEN...Until 645 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 434 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Milton, Lewisburg, Northumberland, Winfield, Linntown, Montandon, Kratzerville, Vicksburg, New Berlin and Bucknell. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
